mapper.select: SELECT location_id, ride_id, value(coordinates).latitude latitude, value(coordinates).longitude longitude, time FROM location
SELECT coordinates_id, ride_id, value(coordinates).latitude latitude, value(coordinates).longitude longitude, time FROM location WHERE location_id = #{locationId}
SELECT coordinates_id, ride_id, value(coordinates).latitude latitude, value(coordinates).longitude longitude, time FROM location WHERE ride_id = #{rideId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO location (ride_id, coordinates, time) VALUES (#{rideId}, new coordinates(#{latitude}, #{longitude}), #{time})
mapper.update: UPDATE location SET (ride_id, coordinates, time) = (#{rideId}, new coordinates(#{latitude}, #{longitude}), #{time}) WHERE location_id = #{locationId}
